TopicTitle: [Stock] Boreas I aircraft-lifter (single stage rocket payload)

Articles.Content:
Today I want to share my first working aircraft-lifter: the Boreas I

This aircraft is able to lift up a stock rocket:

-capsule with parachute

-decoupler

-adv. SAS

-3 fuel tanks

-standard vectoring engine

up to 15km before it can be detached safely (without shutting down the turbojet-engines of the carrier)

The rocket can make its way up to a 100km circular orbit with 50% of one fueltank left for manouvering/deorbiting

here is a short demonstration video:
